```{r}
library(tigris) 
library(leaflet) 
library(tidyverse)

options(tigris_use_cache = TRUE)

low <- read.csv("data_low.csv")[ ,2:3]
```

```{r}
char_zips <- zctas(cb = TRUE)
        
colnames(low) <- tolower(colnames(low))

low$lnestab <- log(low$estab)
char_zips <- geo_join(char_zips, low, 
                              by_sp = "GEOID10", 
                              by_df = "geo.id2",
                              how = "left") 

labels <- 
  paste0(
    "Zip Code: ",
    char_zips@data$GEOID10, "<br/>",
    "Establishment: ",
   char_zips@data$estab) %>%
  lapply(htmltools::HTML)


pal <- colorNumeric(
  palette = "Greens",
  domain = char_zips@data$lnestab)
```


```{r}
char_zips %>% 
  leaflet(options = leafletOptions(preferCanvas = TRUE)) %>% 
  setView(lng = -100, lat = 40, zoom = 4) %>%
  # add base map
  addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron", 
                   options = providerTileOptions(updateWhenZooming = FALSE,
                   updateWhenIdle = FALSE)) %>% 
  # add zip codes
  addPolygons(fillColor = ~pal(lnestab),
              weight = 2,
              opacity = 1,
              color = "white",
              dashArray = "3",
              fillOpacity = 0.7,
              highlight = highlightOptions(weight = 2,
                                           color = "#666",
                                           dashArray = "",
                                           fillOpacity = 0.7,
                                           bringToFront = TRUE),
  label = labels) %>%
  # add legend
  addLegend(pal = pal, 
            values = ~lnestab, 
            opacity = 0.7, 
            title = htmltools::HTML("ln(Establishment) <br> 
                                    by Zip Code <br>
                                    2012"),
            position = "bottomright")
```
